ques: The process includes steps ________ data is collected.
The ________ value of the artwork is high.
He needs to ________ a report by tomorrow.
That's an ________ way of doing things.
He enjoys hiking, and ________, he loves camping.
The ________ meeting will address important topics.
The news seemed to ________ her.
The ________ expert turned out to be a fraud.
She will ________ until she succeeds.
The team will ________ in the conference room.
She provided ________ information about the project.
She will ________ all the data for analysis.
They developed a system ________ users can access information.
She helped ________ the furniture.
The economic downturn can ________ people's spirits.
The ________ 'miracle' product was ineffective.
Her ________ motivation drives her success.
She excels in math, and ________, in science.
Despite challenges, he continues to ________.
The situation seemed rather ________.
They plan to ________ a new device.
It's important to ________ in your efforts.
The company's ________ plans were discussed.
His behavior was quite ________.
The book ________ information from various sources.
He claimed to have a ________ solution.
The new law defines rules ________ citizens can vote.
It's important to address issues that can ________ morale.
The ________ beauty of nature is inspiring.
He is generous, and ________, he is compassionate.
________ events will be announced soon.
The ________ solution wasn't as simple as it sounded.
The agreement outlines terms ________ both parties benefit.
It's ________ to see such a coincidence.
The event will ________ experts from around the world.
________, they share similar interests.
The constant rain can ________ anyone.
The team will ________ a list of recommendations.
The ________ qualities of a person are essential.
She has a ________ determination to achieve her goals.
She had an ________ feeling about it.
He tries not to let setbacks ________ him.
The ________ worth of the product is undeniable.
________ a comprehensive list of references.
The CEO was ________ about the company's future.
________ 'experts' often lack credibility.
________ in pursuing your dreams.
She is hardworking, and ________, she is dedicated.
The platform enables a process ________ users can share content.
________ a group of volunteers to help.
